verbose_text: The T. cruzi SERCA, TcSCA, contains sequence motifs unique to SERCA pumps, localizes to the endoplasmic reticulum in amastigotes, epimastigotes, and trypomastigotes, and is constitutively expressed in all three developmental forms.
evidence: SERCA, TcSCA, contains sequence motifs unique to SERCA pumps, localizes to the endoplasmic reticulum in amastigotes, epimastigotes, and trypomastigotes, and is constitutively expressed
